title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 765-1.6 - Decisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 765-1.6 - Decisions

State Regulations
(a) Copies of the
resolution of the Public Health Council approving or disapproving an
application shall be transmitted to the applicant, the State Hospital Review
and Planning Council, the appropriate health systems agency and the

Commissioner of Health. (b) Copies
of a notice that the council is considering the disapproval of an application
and affording the applicant an opportunity to request a public hearing shall be
transmitted to the applicant and the Commissioner of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
765-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
